com.communote.server.core.config

Class ClientConfigurationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.config.ClientConfigurationHelper

  • public abstract class ClientConfigurationHelper
extends Object
    Helper class to check and create default client configuration properties. Moreover, it provides shortcut methods to get some client configuration properties.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields
